thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Euro Defies Treasury Market’s Gravitational Pull

author: Mike Bird
title: Euro Defies Treasury Market’s Gravitational Pull
text:
For the last year, the euro has been defying the gravitational laws of global markets.
The single currency has surged against the U.S. dollar, even as German bond yields have collapsed to multidecade lows against their American peers. That’s not usually what happens.
The gap between two countries’ short-term bond yields is one of the most...
